author: danielsh
msg: Add error checking.  This manifested as a segfault and a file descriptor leak
in svnsync of an ra_serf source to an ra_local target.
(svn_io_start_cmd2): Check the return value of apr_procattr_io_set().
(run_hook_cmd): Do not try to use CMD_PROC when it may not have been initialized.

author: sagara
msg: Fixed AXIS2-5090  - This fix address following areas.
ADB support for java Collection and schema generation.
ADB support for complex structures such as Map of List or List of Map and nested scenarios.
Support for multinational arrays of object types.

author: lhazlewood
msg: Updated Release Notes to indicate ServletContainerSessionManager change

author: tabish
msg: fix for: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-2583 - nio+ssl initial implementation, don't flip the buffer when its just a plain buffer without SSLEngine wrapping as it result in setting the buffer position and limit to zero since that's where its position is already.  This fixes the failing Stomp NIO tests.

author: danielsh
msg: Another follow-up to r1149456: fix m4 escaping.
